filteredArticles.headline: Here’s how Philadelphia-area colleges are planning for the fall semester
filteredArticles.abstract: Institutions in the Philadelphia region are considering many variations of college life, including full in-person instruction, hybrid in-person and virtual instruction, and a fully virtual semester.
filteredArticles.infobox:
RELATED:

Penn outlines four possible scenarios for fall 2020, will finalize plan by end of June

Here’s how the Ivy League is planning for the fall semester

dominantMedia.title: Penn Campus Fall.jpg
dominantMedia.content: Penn is currently considering four scenarios for the fall semester.

filteredArticles.headline: Nursing students worry missed clinical hours, online replacements leave them underprepared
filteredArticles.abstract: Although Nursing students were initially told they could continue their clinical rotations, the School of Nursing announced on March 13 that Penn Medicine and its affiliates placed an indefinite hold on clinical placements at their facilities.
filteredArticles.infobox:
RELATED:

Penn Nursing receives most NIH funding for third consecutive year

dominantMedia.title: Penn Medicine Tents Spring 2020 Coronavirus.jpg
dominantMedia.content: Penn Medicine facilities, one option for Nursing students to fulfill their rotations at, have put clinical placements on hold indefinitely.
